item.content:encoded:
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorper mattis, pulvinar dapibus leo.

    public void InstallationMoveFiles(string InstallPath)
    {
        string targetPath = Application.streamingAssetsPath + "/../../Builds/" + Path.GetFileName(InstallPath);

        PopUpMessage.Maininstance.Message("Warnung", "Ordner " + InstallPath + " wird zu " + targetPath + " verschoben.", "Okay");


        System.IO.Directory.CreateDirectory(targetPath);


        if (System.IO.Directory.Exists(InstallPath))
        {
            string[] files = System.IO.Directory.GetFiles(InstallPath);


            DirectoryCopy(InstallPath, targetPath, true);


        }
        else
        {
            Console.WriteLine("Source path does not exist!");
        }
    }
